roi_calculation: Critical - Enables automated regression for the most vital and high-risk user flows.
infrastructure_setup: CI/CD integration for automated test execution on every commit.
success_metrics: 98% pass rate for the IAM E2E suite; CI builds complete in under 15 minutes.
risk_factors: CI/CD pipeline instability; Flaky tests in the initial setup.
mitigation_strategies: Quarantine flaky tests immediately; dedicated DevOps support for pipeline.
business_value: Enables confident and frequent releases of the core platform.

roi_calculation: High - Reduces manual regression testing time by 75% for core features.
infrastructure_setup: Performance testing environment setup; expanded test data generation.
success_metrics: Increase overall automated regression coverage to 80%; Establish performance baselines for all core APIs.
risk_factors: Test data management complexity; Maintenance of UI tests.
mitigation_strategies: Use Page Object Model (POM) for UI tests; Automate test data seeding.
business_value: Increases release velocity and confidence for user-facing features.
